Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Both VHL - positive and VHL - negative RCC cells exit the cell cycle by contact inhibition .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| VHL - positive RCC |
| VHL - negative RCC |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| RCC |

In the original paragraph, "VHL" is mentioned, but it is not a disease. It is a protein that is associated with von Hippel-Lindau syndrome, a rare genetic disorder that increases the risk of developing certain types of cancer, including RCC (renal cell carcinoma). Therefore, "RCC" is the only valid disease entity in the paragraph.
